column1: Refer to general caveats a and b for general data information and data quality statements on the general information tab.

1. Other factors related to mental and behavioural disorders and substance use includes ICD-10-AM codes Z00.4, Z03.2, Z04.6, Z09.3, Z13.3, Z54.3, Z61.9, Z63.1, Z63.8, Z63.9, Z65.8, Z65.9, Z71.4, Z71.5 and Z76.0.

2. Other specified mental health-related principal diagnosis includes separations for which the principal diagnosis was any other mental health-related principal diagnosis as listed in the online technical information.
3. Other includes all other codes not included as a mental health principal diagnosis as listed in the online technical information.
